title: Interest Rates, Markets, and The Economy In 2022
itunes:title: Interest Rates, Markets, and The Economy In 2022
description:
Jill Garvey, Senior VP and Senior Wealth Strategist at Huntington National Bank, discusses markets, interest rate hikes, and the economy in 2022. Jennifer Lee, Senior Economist and Managing Director with BMO Capital Markets, discusses the Fed, central banks, and global economies. Steven Oh, Global Head of Fixed Income at PineBridge Investments, talks about the economy, interest rates, and inflation. Bloomberg News Chief Economist Michael McKee discusses the Fed meeting. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
